Monster ID9465

The Infernal pyrelord is a superior version of pyrelords. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour
    • 1.3 Runes
    • 1.4 Coins
    • 1.5 Other
    • 1.6 Gem drop table
    • 1.7 Tertiary
    • 1.8 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Infernal pyrelord kill is worth 39,798.3.

The chance to spawn a superior creature is 1/200.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update | poll)

Infernal pyrelords now drop fiendish ashes in place of regular ashes.

17 March 2021
(update)

Several monsters, including Infernal pyrelord, were tagged as demonic, allowing demonbane weapons to work on them.

13 February 2020
(update)

The monster was added to the game.
